00000000000100010100000110110011                ##XOR R3, R2, R1
00000000001100010110001000110011		  ##OR   R4, R2,R2 
00000000010000011111001010110011		  ##AND R5, R4,R3 
00000000011100100111001010010011		  ##ANDI R5, R4,7 
00000000100000110100001110010011		  ##XORI R7, R6,8 
00000000100101001110010000010011		  ##OR    R9, R8,9 
00000000011100100111001010000011		  ##待拓展访存指令
00000000011100100111001010011111		  ##异常指令
00000000011100100111001010010011		  ##ANDI R5, R4,7
